attributes.action: Stop the Looting of British War Graves
attributes.additional_details:
Dutch salvage vessels are illegally ransacking three sunken British cruisers in an attempt to find valuable scrap metal.

These are the final resting place of an estimated 1459 British soldiers who went down with 3 ships sunk in the First World War

We urge the Ministry of Defence to do something now !! to stop this illegal and immoral activity and to lobby the Dutch Governement to act and arrest those responsible for disturbing these graves
